column4:
Hello [%firstname%],

ProSight Litigation Management Guidelines have been updated and are in effect for all services provided on or after August 1, 2020. These guidelines apply to all current and future claims being handled on behalf of ProSight and our policyholders.

The guidelines must be read and acknowledged by outside counsel when services are requested by ProSight Claims department or our policyholders. It is outside counsel's responsibility to ensure all necessary members of the law firm are familiar and comply with ProSight's guidelines and billing requirements.

As a reminder, all invoices must be submitted in Legal-X. We will also use the Legal-X home page to communicate new announcements and changes - please read this page frequently.

If you believe you received this email in error please contact our Claims Vendor Relations Team at: claimsvendors@prosightspecialty.com

Download ProSight's Litigation Management Guidelines


Claims Vendor Relations Team
412 Mt. Kemble Ave., Ste. 300C
Morristown, NJ 07960
Office: 973.532.1900
www.prosightspecialty.com

ProSight refers to the insurers of ProSight Specialty Insurance Group underwriting insurance policies, which include New York Marine and General Insurance Company, Gotham Insurance Company and Southwest Marine and General Insurance Company. The products and services described herein may not be available in all jurisdictions. Actual coverage is specified by the policies issued. ProSight Specialty Insurance, 412 Mt Kemble Ave, Morristown, NJ 07960.

Privacy | Unsubscribe

{{#if english}}

This content can be presented in multiple languages. This current example is in English language {{paramOne}}.

 

How much wood could a woodchuck chuck

If a woodchuck could chuck wood?

As much wood as a woodchuck could chuck,

If a woodchuck could chuck wood.
{{else if spanish}}

Este contenido puede presentarse en varios idiomas. Este ejemplo actual está en lenguaje Spanish.

 

¿Cuánta madera podría hacer una marmota

Si una marmota podría tirar madera?

Tanta madera como una marmota podría arrojar,

Si una marmota pudiera tirar madera.
{{else if french}}

Ce contenu peut être présenté dans plusieurs langues. Cet exemple actuel est en langage French.

 

Quelle quantité de bois peut avoir un mandrin de marmotte

Si une marmotte pouvait jeter du bois?

Autant de bois qu'une marmotte pourrait jeter,

Si une marmotte pouvait jeter du bois.
{{/if}}

column3: PSOP DICE Online Communication to Brokers
column4:
Get DICE quotes and issue policies instantly!
Hi [%firstname | Valued Partner%],

I hope all is well and you're continuing to stay safe. I wanted to reach out to let you know that ProSight has made it even easier to generate DICE quotes and issue policies online.

You simply log on to ProSight Online for Partners to see all the enhancements we've made. Now you have the ability to:

  • Generate DICE quotes online. No written applications
  • Easily copy and iterate on quotes online
  • Instantly issue and download policy documents

For more information on how to create a quote or issue a policy, please download our "how-to" guide and fact sheet with answers to common questions. Or feel free to reach out to me with any questions. We hope you enjoy this simplified process.

Renee Victores
Value Creation Executive

column3: PSOP Password Reset Required OKTA AD Users
column4:
Password Reset Required
We have upgraded your ProSight account with new security features and wanted to let you know that this upgrade requires you to reset your current password in order to continue accessing our broker portal, ProSight Online for Partners.

You will receive a password reset email from our access management platform (OKTA) titled Account password reset. Please follow the steps within to reset your password. Once your password is reset, sign into ProSight Online for Partners to ensure you have access with your new password.

New Security Features:

  • Security questions
  • Self-service password reset via Forgot your password? on sign in page

If you experience any trouble, please feel free to give our Help Desk a call at 973-532-1895 or send an email to our team.
